title: CCL Tunnel Strengthening - Sections in Soft Marine Clay

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线隧道加固 - 软海洋粘土路段
title_translations.ms: Pengukuhan Terowong CCL - Seksyen Tanah Lembut Marin
title_translations.ta: CCL சுரங்க வலிமையாக்கம் - மென்மையான கடல்கொழும்பு பிரிவுகள்

updates.text: The scheduled disruption is expected to last from Jan 17 to Apr 19 and will affect about 480,000 commuters daily.
Shuttle buses will operate during peak hours to ferry passengers to stations not affected by the works.
Underground tunnels serving three stations on the Circle Line will be partially closed early next year for strengthening works to address a phenomenon known as "tunnel squatting".
This is for works to strengthen the tunnels built in soft marine clay that are more prone to deformation.
